title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained CLI + REST server that runs Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally on macOS, Linux, Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; sync & async clients, streaming, chat & embed endpoints.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; fetch-based, ESM, supports streaming.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to use Ollama models for chat, completion, embeddings, tool-calling.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-like web UI for Ollama; file uploads, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; supports chat, streaming, embeddings, custom timeouts.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate wrapping Ollama REST API with Tokio-based async client.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: NPM installable CLI that wraps ollama-js for quick prompts and file ingestion.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models inline as GitHub-Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for generative QA & retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 community SDK for Ollama; supports chat, streaming, embeddings, polymorphic serializers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama server on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop GUI for Ollama; cross-platform, < 10 MB binary.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers for CI-driven LLM testing & benchmarks.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Self-hosted Telegram bot that proxies chats to your local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-powershell
summary: PowerShell module exposing Ollama cmdlets (Invoke-OllamaChat, Get-OllamaModel) for Windows admins.

title: ollama-node-red
summary: Node-RED nodes to inject prompts and receive streamed completions from Ollama.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-mistral-ft
summary: Scripts to fine-tune Mistral-7b with LoRA and convert weights back into Ollama GGUF.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot that adds /ollama slash commands to servers using local models.
